name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Lexington Park Patuxent River Nas, Md

reviews.text: Really nicely decorated and had everything we needed when we stayed two nights while visiting our daughter at college. Loved the indoor pool, very relaxing to take a swim after a long day and our room was great with a pullout couch for our 11-year-old. Staff was really friendly and helpful and breakfast was nice.
reviews.title: A Nice Place to Stay

reviews.text: Was visiting area and our preferred hotel was booked..our preferred hotel manager arranged a booking for us @ Home2Suites..a very good choice ! Very impressive, as others have stated..looks like a page from the IKEA catalogue ! Staff was friendly and helpful. Security was great..felt extremely safe. Our preferred hotel has the most wonderful view...Home 2 Suites has a very refreshing indoor pool. Home2 Suites is now our #2 preferred hotel in the area..will be looking forward to staying again in the event our preferred hotel is booked.
reviews.title: Excellent stay !!

reviews.text: First time visit was very impressive. The room layout was great an I loved the window treatments that completely shut out the light. Not the ordinary decor which was very pleasant. Lots of space and very clean. Highly recommended. The staff is genuine and friendly.
reviews.title: Surprising Quality of service and accommodations.

reviews.text: We planned to come to the area this weekend for a wedding, but decided at the last minute to stay at a hotel. Actually I used points to stay. This is a new hotel so everything is in great working condition. The room that I have is what they classify as a studio. For two of us it's a decent size.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: In the room there is an apartment size fridge, full size microwave, full size sink (with a disposal), dishwasher, and a coffee maker. The desk chair is comfortable and the desk is actually nested and on wheels so you can move it around.
reviews.title: A jewel of a hotel in Lexington Park, MD

reviews.text: I have traveled quite a bit with my job and have stayed in many different hotels over the years. I've stayed in several long-term type hotels (Extended Stay, etc) and liked the concept and amenities (larger room, full refrigerator and kitchenette), but sometimes I like the attention and amenities of short term hotels (provided breakfast, regular maid service, etc).
reviews.title: Perfect blend of long-term and short term accomodations

reviews.text: I felt that Home2Suites did a great job of blending the two. I would be happy to stay a single night or a month. This particular hotel is very new and everything is pristine.
reviews.title: Better than hotels costing two or three times as much

reviews.text: I stayed the weekend at the Home2 suites while photographing in St. Mary's County. The room cost less than $110/night with my AAA discount, and I was just amazed at how good the hotel is. I have stayed in other chains on similar trips, and I expected a clean but basic room, in a basic, uninteresting hotel. But my room was exceptional, with mircowave and coffemaker, large screen TV, nice QUIET heating system, and plenty of room. The hotel is set back from the highway, which makes it a little harder to find, but also makes it quieter. And the staff was cheerful and helpful. Everything about the hotel was perfect. They even had breakfast set out at 6:00 on Sunday. I would definitely stay there again. I only wish they had more locations.
reviews.title: I will probably regret this

reviews.text: Really nice, new and friendly. A little Euro in its design for the rooms an public areas, but very comfortable. I will probably regret this review, since this is a new hotel and is really easy to get a reservation at right now and it is right next to the Gate at NAVAIR. Very business friendly and I only hope I can continue to get a room there when I need it.
reviews.title: Staying at a Home2 Suites hotel in Lexington Park, MD !

reviews.text: The Home2 Suites hotel in Lexington Park is an enjoyable and memorable experience for business travel. With complimentary breakfast, Wi-fi, and fitness centers, this hotel has a modern and professional atmosphere for the seasoned business traveler. Keep up the good work, the people that work there, and the comfortable, secure experiences for other travelers !
reviews.title: 1/13- Our social club traveled from St. Louis, Mo. to Home2 suites in Lexington Park, MD. Outstanding service!!

reviews.text: Three of us stayed in a one bedroom suite for my daughter's graduation. The room set up worked well, as there was a door between the bedroom and sleeping couch in the main room, offering privacy. The bathroom in between had a door from both rooms. I was disappointed that the windows could not open for fresh air. The bathroom had very few amenities: shampoo, soap and hair dryer, but no conditioner, moisturizer, shower cap, etc. This recently built hotel has the benefit of being new, though it's very generic; I'm not sure how it will age. There was nothing fancy or particularly well built about it... For the price, I expected more. But it suited our needs that one night.
reviews.title: New and clean but bare bones

reviews.text: We recently stayed at this hotel for our son's college graduation and booked 6 rooms. We heard form all of our family that the room had everything we needed. From the refrigerator for our after graduation luncheon to the free washer/dryer for our other college son's clothing, we found this hotel to be fantastic. I did hear the bed was not comfortable (mattress and size) from my parents room but I slept well. Also, the heater/air conditioner made a loud vibrating noise in two rooms. The staff was very accommodating, the handicapped rooms are excellent and the price was really nice with our AAA discount. I highly recommend this hotel for your stay.
reviews.title: Perfect for our family get together

reviews.text: In my line of work, I find myself in the NAS Patuxent River area and I when I do, I always check out Home2. It is my favorite hotel in the area. I would guess that it's now approximately 1.5 years old but it still looks as new as the day it opened. Everyone is very nice and the front desk remember your name, even though the person remembering me, I hadn't seen in 24 hours.
reviews.title: Hadn't stayed here in awhile, but still just as good as before!

reviews.text: When I travel I live in the hotel. I do not like eating out and avoid it on trips if I can. Home2 suites have a very nice little kitchen to work in and they have hot plates on request. Time crunches and just being lazy, this time I opted for some of the frozen meals behind the front desk. I do appreciate their availability. For other travelers, they probably couldn't imagine eating them, but I thanked the front desk for the selection.
reviews.title: Nice suburban hotel in lower Maryland

reviews.text: Probably some odd Maryland law, but I really wish single serve beer could be available as well in the fridge. That would have rounded out my meals in the evening very nicely. But it is what it is.
reviews.title: Good business hotel

reviews.text: I just finished a 2 night stay at this hotel. I found it to be quite lovely.
reviews.title: Pleasant

reviews.text: I try to stay at Hilton properties every week while traveling on business.
reviews.title: Good Extended Stay Option - More Apartment-like

reviews.text: Rooms were VERY clean (love it), had a full fridge, microwave etc... Loved the little living area space separate from bed, and the bathroom was really clean and nice.
reviews.title: Awesome Hotel!!

reviews.text: I was not able to give 5 stars for a few reasons:
reviews.title: Great new hotel!

reviews.text: Beds were so/so...
reviews.title: Amazing Hotel! Perfect for DAU classes. =)

description: Home2 Suites is a spirited, innovative hotel for savvy, cost-conscious Travelers staying a few months or a few nights. From studio and one-bedroom Suites to complimentary bonuses, like the continental breakfast, Spin2 Cycle combined fitness facility with complimentary guest laundry, wired & wireless HSIA, inviting outdoor lounge area with 2 gas grills, and underground garage parking, Home2™ is just your style.
